titleInfo.title: Kitāb Dīsqūrīdis fī mawādd al-‘ilāj كتاب ديسقوريدس في موادّ العلاج Dīsqūrīdis (Dioscorides) ديسقوريدس

physicalDescription.extent: Material: PaperDimensions: 244 x 165 mm leaf [192 x 116 mm written]Foliation: Arabic-Indic foliation in black ink; British Museum foliation in pencil; quire signatures with catchwords only at quire breaksRuling: Misṭarah; 21 lines per page; vertical spacing 11 lines per 10 cmScript: Naskh; mostly vocalised; many transliterated foreign words unpointed; the copyist was also the illuminator as indicated in the colophon (f. 181r)Ink: Black ink, with rubricated headingsDecoration: 287 colour illustrations of plants; 52 spaces left blank for illustrations (note the outlines for an unfinished illustration on f. 88r)Binding: Ottoman binding (19th century?) in brown leather with envelope flap and blocked stamped mandorla with pendants; marbled doublureCondition: Excellent condition, but some water damage especially to illustrations on first 19 foliosMarginalia: Very occasional marginalia
